named-query.name: BalanceEntity.findAllBalancesAfterMonthYear
named-query.query: select b from BalanceEntity b where b.month > :month and b.year > :year and b.user.id = :userId

named-query.name: CategoryEntity.findTotalByCategory
named-query.query: select new br.com.managementfinanceapi.adapter.in.dto.category.TotalByCategoryView( c.name, c.creditLimit, sum(t.amount) as value ) from CategoryEntity c inner join TransactionEntity t ON t.category.id = c.id AND t.user.id = c.user.id where month(t.date) = :month and year(t.date) = :year and c.user.id = :userId group by c.name, c.creditLimit order by value, c.name
